name: <&'b str as str::pattern::Pattern>::strip_prefix_of

str::pattern::Pattern::is_prefix_of.doc: Checks whether the pattern matches at the front of the haystack

str::<impl str>::as_bytes.doc:
Converts a string slice to a byte slice. To convert the byte slice back
 into a string slice, use the [`from_utf8`] function.

 # Examples

 ```
 let bytes = "bors".as_bytes();
 assert_eq!(b"bors", bytes);
 ```

doc: Removes the pattern from the front of haystack, if it matches.
